CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Denial Of Service Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on denial of service activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: RCC: Back Office New Process
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule will watch a "Gold Standard" back-office payment system for process activity and build a whitelist profile of processes running on the "Gold Standard," comparing all other "like" systems with the "Gold Standard" process list. RCC

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Default Act Auth Failure Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on default account authentication failure activity (login failures).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Terminated User Access Activity Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event around access success and failures from terminated accounts (list) within Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Suspicious: Log Cleared
AIE: NIST 800-53: Int Host Comp + Audit Log Clear
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on a host being potentially compromised followed by the audit log being cleared on the same host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Int Host Comp + Acct Created
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on a host being potentially compromised followed by an account being created on the same host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP: Suspicious Activity Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides creates an even and alerts on suspicious activity across all log sources.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Database Authentication
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for database authentication successes & failures from unauthorized accounts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: FIM Add Activity
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for all file integrity monitoring add activity in direct support of PCI-DSS Controls: 11.5.a-b and in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 3.6.7a, 10.2.7

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Signature Update Failure Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on signature update failures.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Reconnaissance Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on reconnaissance activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP: ESP Network Allowed Egress Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on allowed egress network communication to the ESP (electronic security perimeter).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: Malware Detected Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule is designed to Alarm when malware has been detected.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Firewall Policy Synch Information
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for all firewall policy synchronization information.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: ICMP Flood Detected
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Single external host sending a single flow with over 60,000 ICMP packets to an internal host. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 12.3

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: FIM Modify Activity Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for all file integrity monitoring modify activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Rogue WAP Detected Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of any rogue access point detection events.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Attainment: Log Cleared
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: A compromise event from an external source followed by the audit log being cleared on the same compromised host.
ETD CTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: C2: Port Misuse: HTTP
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Detects HTTP traffic not using the common port 80.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: C2: Blocked Outbound Traffic then Allow
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: 400 or more internal network traffic denies, followed by a network allow event with the same origin host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: SOX: Attack Detected Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE rule creates an event and alerts on known attacks or failed attack attempts across the environment.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Configuration Change Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on configuration changes.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Compromise: Unusual Auth then Unusual Process
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: First tracks normal hosts accessed by a user and which processes are used. Afterwards, triggers when the user authenticates to a different host and starts a process that was not seen in the same learning period.
ETD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Account Access Revoked
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on account access revocation (access revoked, account disabled, account locked, account removed from group, ownership revoked, and privilege revoked).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: C2: Port Misuse: FTP
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Detects FTP servers running on non-standard ports.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Term Act Auth Failure Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an alert and provides details on terminated account authentication failure activity (login failure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: FFD: Dormant Account Used
AIE: RCC: POS Abnormal Auth Activity
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule will build a whitelist profile of the authentication activity to and from POS endpoints. If a new Origin Login is seen, or new hosts are involved in the authentication activity, the rule will fire. RCC

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Compromise Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on compromises.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Ext Host Comp + Audit Log Clear
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on a host being potentially compromised followed by the audit log being cleared on the same host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Data Loss Prevention Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details of data generated by the LogRhythm Data Loss Defender or other data loss prevention solutions, when configured.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Account Usage
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for authentication successes and failures from unauthorized accounts in direct support of PCI-DSS Controls: 2.1.a-b, 10.2.1, 10.2.4 & in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 8.1.3.a, 8.1.4, 8.5.c

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Failed Audit Log Write Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on audit log write failures.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP: Term Act Auth/Accs Failure Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule generates an alert on terminated account authentication failure activity (login failure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: External Malicious User-Agent
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: User agent string used by hacking/security research tools found in web server logs. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 12.2, CSC 8.1

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Denied Internet => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for denied communication from the external internet to all internal environments.

CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Communication with 2 or more ips listed in the any of the LR Threat Intelligence lists.
Modules: Threat Intelligence Service

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Concr Remote Auth Country
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on multiple VPN authentication successes from the same origin login from different countries within a given time period (default 1 day).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Recon: Failed Distributed Brute Force
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Multiple failed authentication attempts from different external origin hosts to the same impacted host using the same origin login, without seeing an authentication success.
UTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Lateral: Failed Auths then Success
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Multiple internal unique login attempts are seen on the same impacted host within a short period of time, followed by a successful authentication.
UTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Account Locked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on locked accounts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Lateral: Admin Password Modified
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: User changes the password of a different privileged user account.
CTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Shared Acct Access Failure Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event for access failures of shared accounts (list) within the Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Audit Log Write Failure Alert Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of audit log write failures in direct support of PCI-DSS Controls: 10.2.6

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: FW Policy Synch Failure Alert Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of any critical failure or error to firewall policy synchronization in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.2.a-b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: C2: Port Misuse: SSH Outbound
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Outbound SSH traffic connecting over a non-standard port (not 22).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Compromise: Malware Event
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Any event with a malware classification.
ETD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: SOX: Critical/PRD Envir Config/Policy Change
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE rule creates an alert any time a configuration or policy modification logs are received from a critical or production environment (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: FFD: Failed Login followed by New ACH Payee
AIE: HSS: Eligible Professional Act Access Failure
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on Eligible Professional account access failure activity (failed object access/add/close/create/delete/download/execute/initialize/modify/move/read/rename/remove).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Denied DMZ => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for denied communication from the demilitarized zone to the internal network in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.1.a-c, 1.3.3, & 2.2.2.a-b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Exfil: Significant Outbound Traffic Increase
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Measures the rate of outbound traffic from a host and generates an event if that rate increases.
ETD NTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13: Logging Exception
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE rule creates an event and alerts on logging exceptions within the LogRhythm console as a result of a log reset, error condition, failure or threshold exception to supplement testing of GPG-13 control PMC10.1 [A].

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Default Acct Access Failure Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event for access failures of default and generic accounts (list) within the Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Compromise: Multiple Unique Attack Events
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Multiple, unique attack events against the same host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53: Ext Concur VPN Auth Same User
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on multiple VPN logins from the same user but from different origin hosts within a short period of time.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: C2: Repeat Security Events
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: The same security related event occurs on a single host 10 or more times.
ETD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Term Act Auth Success Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on terminated account authentication success activity (login success).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Misuse Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on misuse activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: System Critical And Error Conditions Rul
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE rule creates and alert and generates an event for critical or error conditions encountered across all Log Sources

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: FIM Information
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for information from file integrity monitoring software in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 12.10.5

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internal => Internet Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the internal environment to the external internet.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Wireless => CDE Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the wireless environment to the internal card holder data environment in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 2.2.2.a-b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Backup Information Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details of information from backup software.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13: Intrnl Monitor Dvc Critical
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts on any message from a boundary monitoring device at critical status and above to supplement testing of GPG-13 control PMC5.2 [Alert B].

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: Workstation Device Driver Activity Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AI Engine rule provides details on workstation driver errors and general activity. Attempts to utilize unapproved devices can be identified with this rule, by evaluating the logging generated when device drivers are being processed.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Compromise: Obsolete SSL/TLS Version
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: SSL/TLS Vulnerable Versions Detected.
CTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: FFD: Contact Email Change

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Early TLS/SSL Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of any identified TLS LogRhythm Network Monitor event.

CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule will look for any file system changes on a back office payment system and fire if changes are identified. RCC

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Host Firewall Failure Alert

CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of software update failures.

Modules:

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: BSI:IT-G: Alarm bei Malware
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: BSI:IT-Grundschutz M 2.35 Informationsbeschaffung ber Sicherheitslcken des Systems: Alarm wenn eine Malware detektiert wurde.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Shared Acct Auth Success Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event for shared account (list) authentication success across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Remote Session Timeout
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for remote session timeouts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Recent Disable Acct + Acs Succes
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on recently disabled/deleted accounts successfully authenticating/accessing resources.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Alarm on Malware Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts for any malware detection on any device that exists on the configured log source list or devices supporting network monitoring

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53: Int Host Comp + Acct Created
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on a host being potentially compromised followed by an account being created on the same host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53: Int Brute Force Sngl Origin Host
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides multiple failed authentication attempts from the same origin host to the same impacted host, followed by an authentication success from the same origin host to the same impacted host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Compromise: Security Event then Scheduled Tas
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: A security event on a host followed by creation of a scheduled process.
ETD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Critical/Error Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of critical or error messages from a given host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Denied DMZ => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for denied communication from the demilitarized zone to the internal network.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: FIM Failure Alert Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of any critical failure or error to file integrity monitoring in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 12.10.5

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: Inbound Traffic fm NonWhitelist Country
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Inbound connection from a suspicious country defined as being absent in the "Network: Whitelisted Countries" list. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 12.1

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Default Act Access Success Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on default account access success activity(object access/add/close/create/delete/download/execute/initialize/modify/move/read/rename/remove).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP: VPN Node Registration Fail (Auth)
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts on any unsuccessful Virtual Private Network (VPN) node registration attempt into the Electronic Security Perimeter for authorized VPN users (list).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Acct Created, Used, Deleted Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an alert and provides details on a new account created, then used, and then the account is deleted within the same day.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Denied Wireless => CDE Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for denied communication from the test environment to the external internet in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.1.a-c, 2.2.2.a-b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Compromise: Corroborated Anomalies
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: 3 or more unique behavioral anomalies for a given host within a 3-hour period.
ETD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Corruption: Audit Disabled by Admin
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Login by an administrator followed by disabling of an audit process.
CTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: SSL Activity
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule triggers on the occurrence of any identified TLS LogRhythm Network Monitor event.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: C2: Abnormal Origin Location
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: First tracks geographic locations for VPN logins. Afterwards, triggers when a new origin location is seen for a user.
UTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Compromise: Auth with Threat List IP
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Authentication success activity to an IP on any of the LR Threat Intelligence lists.
Modules: Threat Intelligence Service

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Network Anomaly: Threat List Phishing URL
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Communication with an IP listed in the list "LR Threat List : URL : Phishing"
Modules:

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: FFD: Login from Suspicious Host
AIE: MAS: Vulnerability Detected Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of vulnerabilities or suspicious events across the organization's environment.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: Default Act Access Failure Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on default account access failure activity (failed object access/add/close/create/delete/download/execute/initialize/modify/move/read/rename/remove) within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Antivirus Failure Alert Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of any critical failure or error to antivirus in direct support of PCI-DSS Controls: 5.2.d and in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 5.1, 5.2.b-c

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Recon: Excessive Inbound Firewall Denies
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: For this rule we look for an excessive number (400) of network denied events from a host within 5 minutes.
CTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53: Recent Disable Acct + Acs Fail
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on recently disabled/deleted accounts failing to authenticate/access resources.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: HR Payroll Acct Auth Success Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event around HR or Payroll account (list) authentication success across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Priv Acct UAM Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event for various access modifications to privileged accounts (list) occurring within Critical or Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Account Locked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on locked accounts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Audit Logging Stopped Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on audit logging being stopped.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: SOX: Data Destruction Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE rule creates an event and alerts when a compromise or attack occurs, followed by file integrity monitoring activities on the same impacted host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: Suspicious Activity Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on suspicious activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Shared Acct Disabled/Enabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event when a shared account (list) has access revoked (disabled) or granted (enabled) across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: BU Acct Disabled/Enabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event when a business user account (list) has access revoked (disabled) or granted (enabled) across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Denied Test => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for denied communication from the test environment to other internal environments.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Compromise: Cross-site Scripting (XSS)
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Common URL-encoded <script> tags in a URL, indicating a reflected cross-site scripting attack.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13: File Monitoring Event - File Changes
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule supplements testing of GPG-13 control PMC4.11 [Alert C].

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: Door Access Success Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on physical door access within the organization infrastructure. Drilldowns from this rule can provide good door activity tracking evidence for sending to Cases, within Case Management.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Account Disabled/Locked
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for disabled/locked accounts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: C2: IRC on Non-Standard Port
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: IRC traffic run on a non-standard IRC port is seen.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Audit Log Cleared Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on audit log clearing.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Malware Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of any identified Malware event.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: TEST SSL TLS Versioning Rule
AIE: PCI-DSS: FIM Information
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for information from file integrity monitoring software.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internet => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the external internet to all internal environments.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Network Anomaly: Threat List Phishing IP
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Communication with an IP listed in the list "LR Threat List : IP : Phishing"
Modules:

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Int Acct Created, Used, Deleted
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on a new account created, then used, and then the account is deleted within the same day.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Progression: to Exfil, Corruption, Disruption
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Progression rules monitor for activity moving through the attack lifecycle. This alarm will fire when observed activity categorized as any earlier stage is followed by Exfiltration, Corruption, Disruption with the same user or host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: FIM Activity Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event fir file integrity monitoring activity including adds, deletes, modifies, group changes, owner changes, and permissions. The FIM log source can be established from LogRhythm's FIM or other FIM solutions.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: Audit Disabled by Admin
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Login by an administrator followed by disabling of an audit process. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 6.2, CSC 5.1

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Test => Internet Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the test environment to the external internet in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.1.a-b, 2.2.2.a-b, 6.4.1, 6.4.2

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Default Act Access Failure Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on default account access failure activity (failed object access/add/close/create/delete/download/execute/initialize/modify/move/read/rename/remove).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53: Ext Conc Remote Auth Mltpl Count
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on multiple VPN authentication successes from the same origin login from different countries within a given time period (default 1 day).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: RCC: Back Office DLD Event
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule will look for any LogRhythm Data Loss Defender events on a back office payment system and fire if any are observed. RCC

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Honeypot: Malware Activity
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Observed attempted/successful malware activity on the host.
Modules: Honeypot

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Online Banking Auth Fail Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event around account authentication failures within Online Banking environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Personel Login Authentication Method
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule can be used to gather event data for review with drilldowns. Any authentication event identified within an environment should be added to the criteria of Rule Block 1.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NRC : Failed Writing To Audit Log
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: NRC RG 5.71: B.1.5

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: System Time Change After Compromis
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE rule creates an event every time an attack occurs within the environment, followed by a time change.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Configuration or Policy Change
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts on any change to any device configurations or policies within the defined environment.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: C2: Excessive Unique Outbound Connections
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Excessive network connections (default of 100) on any port other than 80 or 443.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: C2: Malware: Outbound IRC
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: An internal host seen communicating using IRC ports.
CTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: Accounts Deleted by Admin
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: An observed login by a user in the privileged user list followed by the deletion of more than one account. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 16.3, CSC 3.6

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Shared Act Auth Failure Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on shared account authentication failure activity (login failure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Suspicious Door Access Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on physical door access.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: Config Deleted/Disabled
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Configuration deleted within the organization infrastructure. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 3.5, CSC 11.3

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: Repeat Attacks Against a Host
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: The same security event is detected on the same host multiple times within a short window. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 12.2

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: UDP Flood Detected
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Single external host sending a single flow with over 100,000 UDP packets to an internal host. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 12.3

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Host Compromise + Time Change
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on a host being potentially compromised, followed by time change activity on the same impacted host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13: Blocked File Import/Export Attempt
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts for any blocked attempts to import or export files across the boundary to supplement testing of GPG-13 control PMC2.4 [Alert B], 2.5 [Alert B].

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: FIM Delete Activity Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for all file integrity monitoring delete activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Error Condition Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on error conditions.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Non-Admin Windows Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an alert and provides detail when a user not in the ISO 27001: Privileged Account List chooses to run a Windows program as an administrator using the "Run as administrator" option.
